text: The Lost Child is a 1904 American silent comedy movie directed by Wallace McCutcheon, Sr.The Lost ChildTHE LOST CHILD and stars Kathryn Osterman. ==Actors== * Kathryn Osterman ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1904 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Wallace McCutcheon Sr.
title: The Lost Child (1904 movie)
